alert.note: Alert for Robeson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 22 at 4:38PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A shower will impact portions of southern Robeson and Dillon Counties through 515 PM EST... At 437 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a shower near Minturn, or near Dillon, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dillon, Fairmont, Latta, Rowland, Fork, Hamer, South Of The Border, Bingham, Floydale, Smithboro, Kemper, Little Rock, Minturn, Proctorville, Mcdonald, Orrum, and Mcleod Medical Center. This includes the following highways... Interstate 95 in South Carolina between mile markers 185 and 198. Interstate 95 in North Carolina between mile markers 1 and 7. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
